title: All You Need Is Kill
author: Hiroshi Sakurazaka, Ryosuke Takeuchi
description: A soldier relives the same deadly battle against alien invaders, learning and improving with each loop.

title: Death Note
author: Tsugumi Ohba, Takeshi Obata
description: A high school student discovers a mysterious notebook that allows him to kill anyone by writing their name, leading to a cat-and-mouse battle with a genius detective.

title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure Part 3: Stardust Crusaders
author: Hirohiko Araki
description: Jotaro Kujo and his allies embark on a journey across the world to defeat the vampire Dio, encountering bizarre Stand battles along the way.

title: Attack on Titan
author: Hajime Isayama
description: In a world besieged by man-eating Titans, humanity fights for survival behind massive walls as a young soldier uncovers the truth about the Titans and the world.

title: One Piece
author: Eiichiro Oda
description: Monkey D. Luffy and his pirate crew sail across the seas in search of the legendary treasure known as the One Piece.

title: Naruto
author: Masashi Kishimoto
description: A young ninja strives to become the Hokage of his village, overcoming challenges and fighting powerful enemies along the way.

title: Fullmetal Alchemist
author: Hiromu Arakawa
description: Two brothers use alchemy in their quest to restore their bodies after a failed alchemical ritual, uncovering deep conspiracies in their world.

title: Berserk
author: Kentaro Miura
description: Guts, a lone mercenary, battles through a dark medieval world filled with demons and political intrigue, driven by vengeance against his former friend Griffith.

title: Hunter x Hunter
author: Yoshihiro Togashi
description: Gon Freecss becomes a Hunter to search for his missing father, encountering friends, enemies, and deadly challenges.

title: Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba
author: Koyoharu Gotouge
description: Tanjiro Kamado becomes a demon slayer after his family is slaughtered and his sister is turned into a demon, seeking to find a cure.

title: Chainsaw Man
author: Tatsuki Fujimoto
description: Denji, a poor young man, merges with his pet devil Pochita to become Chainsaw Man, fighting against devils in a brutal, surreal world.

title: Bleach
author: Tite Kubo
description: Ichigo Kurosaki gains the powers of a Soul Reaper, protecting humans from evil spirits and guiding souls to the afterlife.

title: Dragon Ball
author: Akira Toriyama
description: Son Goku embarks on adventures to find the mystical Dragon Balls, facing martial arts tournaments and powerful enemies.

title: Tokyo Ghoul
author: Sui Ishida
description: College student Kaneki becomes half-ghoul after a deadly encounter, struggling with his new identity in a society divided between humans and ghouls.

title: My Hero Academia
author: Kohei Horikoshi
description: In a world where nearly everyone has superpowers called Quirks, Izuku Midoriya trains to become a hero despite being born powerless.

title: Black Clover
author: Yki Tabata
description: Asta, a boy born without magic in a world where magic is everything, strives to become the Wizard King.

title: Slam Dunk
author: Takehiko Inoue
description: Hanamichi Sakuragi, a delinquent, joins his high school basketball team to impress a girl, discovering his love for the sport.

title: Monster
author: Naoki Urasawa
description: Dr. Tenma saves the life of a boy who grows up to be a serial killer, leading him into a psychological thriller across Europe.

title: Vinland Saga
author: Makoto Yukimura
description: A young Viking warrior seeks revenge while being caught up in battles, politics, and the search for a promised land.

title: The Promised Neverland
author: Kaiu Shirai, Posuka Demizu
description: Children at a seemingly idyllic orphanage discover the dark truth behind their existence and plan a daring escape.
